Name: Kwekkeboom
Review Text: Simple and unsophisticated patisserie. Probably the chocolates are good, but I don't suggest to come here for cakes. They are mediocre, Albert-Heijn-like quality, so not worth the price difference. Especially when there is awesome Rum Baba 50 meters away (eh, I am not owner of Rum Baba, just expressing my opinion).
